concept.definition: Forward requests to an external service. The operation acts as a reverse proxy, forwarding requests to a configured URL with optional header transformation.
Execute a SQL query against the database. The query can use parameters from the request and returns results as JSON.
Evaluate a FHIRPath expression against input data. Useful for data transformation and extraction operations.
Invoke a registered custom handler function. The handler is implemented in Rust code and registered with the server at startup.
